title: Shaonian Ge Xing
overview: After the Master of Hanshui Temple died mysteriously heard throughout the world, triggering disputes between the World of Martial arts. Those who have Strength are in a very favorable position. Thunder, Sorrow, Tang Lian, Sikong Qiansuo, Tiannuru, and others have been involved in disputes. And a story about a gold coffin will be staged soon. Dream Zhu Jianghu, relying on swords to sing songs. The secret of the golden coffin gradually appeared.
